item.title: Get Email Alerts When COVID-19 Vaccines Become Available Near You
item.description: The COVID-19 vaccination program in India was earlier available to people above 45 years of age but starting May 1st, anyone above the age of 18 years can get vaccinated. That said, vaccine availability remains an issue countrywide and it is cumbersome to manually check slots every few hours. Vaccinate India Site: Vaccinate India The governmentâ€™s official website cowin.gov.in has a useful search section that allows you see the nearby vaccination centers in your city or zip code.
